setupInstructions.step1: Go to https://neon.tech and create a new project
setupInstructions.step2: Copy the connection string from your Neon dashboard
setupInstructions.step3: Update the DATABASE_URL in env.production with your actual credentials
setupInstructions.step4: Run 'node scripts/setup-neon-database.js' to set up the database
setupInstructions.step5: Deploy the updated configuration to Vercel
setupInstructions.step6: Test the API integrations in the admin panel
